SELECT A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_ID , A.MENU_URL , A.MENU_PARAM , LEVEL , DECODE(A.USE_YN, 'Y', 1, 'N', 0) AS USE_YN , #menuGrpCd# AS ACC_CD , NVL(B.MENU_ACC, 0) AS MENU_ACC FROM TB_COMM_MENU A LEFT JOIN (SELECT MENU_ID, ACC_CD, MENU_ACC FROM TB_COMM_MENUACC WHERE ACC_CD = #menuGrpCd# ) B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.MENU_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWord#||'%'
AND A.MENU_URL LIKE '%'||#searchWord#||'%'
AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.USE_YN = 'N'
START WITH A.MENU_ID_PAR = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID_PAR ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.V_ORDER

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COMM_MENU A LEFT JOIN (SELECT MENU_ID, ACC_CD, MENU_ACC FROM TB_COMM_MENUACC WHERE ACC_CD = 'SYS' ) B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.MENU_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWord#||'%'
AND A.MENU_URL LIKE '%'||#searchWord#||'%'
AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.USE_YN = 'N'
START WITH A.MENU_ID_PAR = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID_PAR ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.V_ORDER

MERGE INTO TB_COMM_MENUACC USING DUAL ON (MENU_ID = #menuId# AND ACC_CD = #accCd#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MENU_ACC = #menuAcc# , UPD_ID = #sessionUsrId# , UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE MENU_ID = #menuId# AND ACC_CD = #accCd#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MENU_ID, ACC_CD, MENU_ACC, REG_ID, REG_DTTM) VALUES ( #menuId# , #accCd# , #menuAcc# , #sessionUsrId# , SYSDATE )
